Detailed Description

The Link class reperesents a <link> element within a <collection> item.

Definition at line 85 of file link.cpp.

ConstManifestItemPtr Link::ReferencedManifestItem ( ) const

Obtain the ManifestItem referenced by this link.

Note that this may legally return nullptr– <link> elements within a <collection> aren't required to target manifest items, and <link> elements within <package/metadata> are required not to.

Returns
The referenced ManifestItem, or nullptr if the link doesn't reference a manifest item from this Package.
